rules_text:
Whenever a nontoken land is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. If you do, create a tapped token that's a copy of it.
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, teach up to one target creature trample. [i](Put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
